This is used to generate calendar reminders or create events for promotional activities you are planning to participate in.
This app requires the Calendar permission to create Calendar events. You can grant this permission in Settings.
This app requires the Calendar permission to delete Calendar events. You can grant this permission in Settings.
This is used to create Calendar reminders so you can set and receive reminders for events.
This is used for AR interactive services.

resources.string: Open ad when you\'re back online.
A new Ad-ID will be randomly assigned.
You can opt out of receiving personalized ads that use your Ad-ID. If you opt out, you will still receive ads, but they may be less relevant to you. %1$s
Learn more about data use and your rights

We will collect information about your onscreen actions in these settings and about apps that use your Ad-ID in order to improve our services. For more information on how we use this data, touch %1$s.
We will collect information about your onscreen actions in these settings and about apps that use your Ad-ID in order to improve our services.
Your Ad-ID (also known as an OAID) is a temporary device identifier used to provide you with personalized ads.
You can opt out of receiving personalized ads that use your Ad-ID. If you opt out, you will still receive ads, but they may be less relevant to you. %1$s
You can opt out of receiving personalized ads that use your Ad-ID. If you opt out, you will still receive ads, but they may be less relevant to you.
Your Ad-ID (also known as an OAID) is a non-permanent device identifier used to provide you with personalized ads.
Personalized advertising services recommend content you may be interested in. Your privacy will be protected at all times. For more details, please see the %1$s.
Personalized advertising services recommend content that you may be interested in. Your privacy will be protected at all times. For more information, please see the following:

The HUAWEI Ads platform provides advertising services for Huawei Mobile Services and third-party apps. If personalized ads are enabled, your personal data may be used to provide you with more relevant and useful ads. To learn more about how your data is used and about your rights, please refer to the %1$s.

The HUAWEI Ads platform provides advertising services for Huawei Mobile Services and third-party apps. If personalized ads are enabled, your personal data may be used to provide you with more relevant and useful ads.
